translations: n.胭脂仙人掌；胭脂仙人掌肉；胭脂仙人掌属植物

phrs.translation: 仙人掌, 臙脂仙人掌, 仙人掌绿色

sentences.sentence: NeOptunia: NeOptunia is an all natural potent fat-binding product derived from the Nopal Cactus Plant. It is the most powerful fat binding product on the market.
sentences.translation: 它是所有从仙人掌植物中提取的自然界中最强大的脂肪结合的产品。这是在市场上最强大的约束脂肪的产品。
